channel.title: Comments for page "Time to Kill"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Time to Kill"

item.title: Is this really a Monochrome Gen mission?
item.content:encoded: Has anyone been able to get this mission by running Gen Monochrome missions after getting Awesome Pants? I spent fifty smoke bombs trying, and gave up and went to General Monochrome missions, where I got it in 10. Hardly conclusive evidence I realize, but still an extremely unlikely coincidence.
